resources.string:
Hi, my name is Shashidhar. 

Full stack Javascript developer with 4.5 years of experience in Web Development, Restfull API’s, Internet of Things.
Primary technology interests JavaScript, Node JS platform, Express JS, Angulsr JS, MongoDB. Strong proficiency with Javascript. Hands-on experience in creating RESTfull API’s using express js framework on Node js platform. Good understanding of nature of asynchronous programming and it quirks and workarounds. Basic understanding of front end technologies such as Angular JS, Ext Js, HTML, CSS, twitter bootstrap. Experienced in designing schemas/tables in NoSQL-Mongo DB, MySQL database. Proficient understanding of version controlling tools such as GIT.
